ingredients.ingredient: 8 cups salad greens, washed and torn into bite-size pieces
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can whole pitted black olives, drained
1 (14 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and quartered
8 ounces cooked and chilled shell pasta
1 Â½ cups Italian-style salad dressing, or to taste

cookingTips: Use a combination of marinated antipasto ingredients for depth of flavor
Cool pasta completely before adding to prevent wilting greens
Dress salad just before serving to maintain crisp texture throughout
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do the briny, tangy flavors of antipasto ingredients complement the mild flavor of tuna?
